member.name: HTTP_VERSION
member.summary: TheHTTP_VERSION structure defines a version of the HTTP protocol that a request requires or a response provides. This is not to be confused with the version of the HTTP Server API used, which is stored in an structure.

member.name: HTTP_VERSION.MajorVersion
member.summary: Major version of the HTTP protocol.

member.name: HTTP_VERSION.MinorVersion
member.summary: Minor version of the HTTP protocol.
